name: serverless-plugin-thundra
description: Thundra's serverless plugin for automatic wrapping

scripts.release-patch: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it --ci --git.commit --git.push --git.tag --git.tagName='v${version}' --github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-minor: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it minor --ci --git.commit --git.push --git.tag --git.tagName='v${version}' --github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-major: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it major --ci --git.commit --git.push --git.tag --git.tagName='v${version}' --github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-patch-without-tag: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-minor-without-tag: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it minor --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-major-without-tag: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it major --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-dry-run: npm install; npm run lint; npm run build; release-it --dry-run --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --no-npm.publish

author: Suleyman Barman <suleyman@thundra.io> (https://www.thundra.io/apm)
